articles.title: COVID was the leading cause of death in Americans aged 45-54 in 2021 - Ars Technica
articles.description: About 1 in 8 US deaths were from COVID-19 between March 2020 and October 2021.
articles.content: Enlarge/ A woman watches white flags on the National Mall on September 18, 2021 in Washington, DC. Over 660,000 white flags were installed here to honor Americans who have lost their lives to COVID-1… [+2674 chars]

articles.author: Gavin Cooney
articles.title: Lowry's late charge at JP McManus Pro-Am title falls short as Harrington ties course record - The42
articles.description: American Xander Schauffele held off the challenge of Lowry and Sam Burns to win the title.
articles.content:
SHANE LOWRYS LATE charge wasnt enough to deny Xander Schauffele victory in the JP McManus Pro-Am at Adare Manor. 
Schauffele shot a course record, blemish-free 64 yesterday, and followed it up with … [+2867 chars]

articles.title: Fox analyst’s comments on Toronto amid Kevin Durant trade rumours receive backlash from Canadian fans - Toronto Star
articles.description: “Can they keep African-American superstars there?” said pundit Chris Broussard, over Toronto Raptors trade rumours, raising eyebrows on this side of the border.
articles.content:
Fox Sports pundit Chris Broussard has ruffled feathers this side of the border after comments he made about Toronto in a recent broadcast.
“It’s not America!” said Broussard. “And you feel it! Espec… [+1241 chars]

articles.title: WNBA star Brittney Griner sends letter to President Biden pleading for his help - CBC Sports
articles.description: Brittney Griner has made an appeal to President Joe Biden in a letter passed to the White House through her representatives saying she feared she might never return home and asking that he not "forget about me and the other American Detainees."
